english.segment1: Can You take me by the hand. Can You use me as I am. Break me into who You want me to be
english.segment2: When the time is finally right. Will You open up my eyes. Show me everything You want me to see
english.segment3: This life is not my own
english.segment4: To God alone be the glory. To God alone be the praise. Everything I say and do. Let it be all for You. The glory is Yours alone. Yours alone
english.segment5: Take the offering I bring. You want more than what I sing. Can I give You every part of me
english.segment6: Turn these pennies into gold. Take this life I call my own. Until I'm running after Your heart
english.segment8: To God alone be the glory. To God alone be the praise. Everything I say and do. Let it be all for You. The glory is Yours alone
english.segment9: We will rise, and we will fall. But You remain after all. You're glorious and beautiful. You're beautiful
english.segment10: To God alone be the glory. To God alone be the praise. Everything I say and do. Let it be all for You. The glory is Yours alone. The glory is Yours alone. Yours alone. Yours alone
